title: Enbo (Taboo Charming Mother)
synopsis: It has been a year since Misako became Yosuke Amamiya's wife, but her new stepson Kazuhiko is still barely acknowledging her, let alone seeing her as a mother figure. However, there is a more pressing matter on her mind: when she is alone at home, she frequently receives menacing calls from a stranger possessing detailed knowledge of her day-to-day life. Unable to bring this issue up with Yosuke, she remains silent about these disturbing interactions.
staff: [['Awai, Shigeki', ['Director']], ['Fukumoto, Kan', ['Director']], ['Miyabi, Tsuzuru', ['Original Creator']], ['Abukawa, Yasuyuki', ['Color Design']]]
